19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to take out an 'Anazah (a short spear) on the day of Al-Fitr and the day of Al-Adha, plant it in the ground, and pray facing toward it

chapter.eng-name: Offer the 'Eid prayer facing an 'Anazah (a short spear)
